title: Sales Workflow SOP Builder – Leads → Replies, Fast

steps.title: Intake
steps.desc: We capture your goals, offer, audience and tools.

steps.title: Map & Draft
steps.desc: Outline outreach steps, embed AI prompts, assign lead status tags and micro‑cadence.

steps.title: Checklist & QA
steps.desc: Create a one‑page Quick‑Start with the 10‑Tag taxonomy; test the cadence for clarity.

steps.title: Review & Finalize
steps.desc: You review; I apply one focused revision and deliver.

faqs.q: Will this work if my pipeline is messy?
faqs.a: Yes. Share your goals and typical prospects; I’ll structure a minimal sales workflow you can follow.

faqs.q: Which tools or CRMs are supported?
faqs.a: It works with any CRM or email tool; just provide the details you use.
One round focused on clarity and usability tweaks; major scope or strategy changes aren’t included.

requirements: 2–3 sentences on your sales goal and typical prospects
Tools and CRM you use (e.g., ChatGPT, Gmail, HubSpot)
(Optional) Example outreach email or scenario to optimize
